alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 3:05AM EST until January 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total of up to four inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...The central and southern Champlain Valley of Vermont and New York, as well as southeastern St. Lawrence County of New York. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will lead to a slippery commute this morning. After a brief lull midday, precipitation returns as rain late this afternoon into the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
